content.prompt: Which of the following policies, if appropriately sized, would provide expansion during a recession with the smallest change in interest rates?

choices.label: A decrease in government spending and a decrease in administered interest rates
An increase in government transfer payments and an increase in administered interest rates
A decrease in taxes and a decrease in the interest rate on reserves
An increase in government spending and an increase in the interest rate on reserves
An increase in taxes and an increase in administered interest rates

topic.text: 5.1: Fiscal and Monetary Policy Actions in the Short Run
